titles.title: I Will Sing Of The Mercies

properties.copyright: 1999 PsalmSinger Music, Administered by The Copyright Company

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
I will sing of the mercies of the Lord forever
I will sing I will sing
I will sing of the mercies of the Lord forever
I will sing of the mercies of the Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
With my mouth will I make known
Thy faithfulness
Thy faithfulness
With my mouth will I make known
Thy faithfulness to all generations

verse.name: e1
verse.lines:
I will sing of the mercies of the Lord forever
I will sing of the mercies of the Lord
